pages.text: There are currently four types of new ores added. Each serving different propose in crafting.

pages.title: Jade
pages.text: $(item)Jade Ore$() generate deep underground, in small clusters, similar to $(item)Diamond Ore$(). $(br)Requires $(thing)iron$() or better tools to mine.

pages.title: Magnesite
pages.text: $(item)Magnesite Ore$() generate similarly to $(item)Lapis$(). $(br)Requires $(thing)stone$() or better tools to mine.

pages.title: Hematite
pages.text: $(item)Hematite Ore$() generate at the same levels as $(item)Iron Ore$(). $(br)Requires $(thing)stone$() or better tools to mine.

pages.title: Nether Cobalt
pages.text: $(item)Nether Cobalt Ore$() generate in lower levels of $(thing)Nether$(), usually in small clusters. $(br)Requires $(thing)iron$() or better tools to mine.
